intro: Psychotria balansae, commonly known as the Balansae Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in the understory of humid forests. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It produces small, dark blue to black berries that are often consumed by various bird species. Due to its habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native range.
